channel.title: Weaver Goldman
channel.description: An upcoming freshman at WPI, specializing in CS, ML, and Robotics! See some of my projects, or connect with me.

item.title: Publishing Java Packages to Maven Central Repository
item.description: How to successfully navigate the surprisingly tedious process of sharing java packages (using GitHub actions).

item.title: Synchronized Widgets Without A Server
item.description: Using web technologies and math to synchronize widgets without the need for a server.
